ygData.subject: Re: Epicized
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats Kenross!!  It is great to finally see a List bard get one.  We seem to have several 55+ bards on the server but only a few, in my opinion, worthy of
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats Kenross!! It is great to finally see a "List" bard get
one. We seem to have several 55+ bards on the server but only a few,
in my opinion, worthy of this epic item ;)

Rosha Cristi, Bard off 55 {insert something musical here}
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk

--- In eqbards@y..., "Kenneth E. Bachman" <kbachman@e...> wrote:
> I went to New York on business for two weeks. Within an hour of
getting
> into EQ again, my guild gave me a small gift: a red scale and a
white
> scale. So I managed to finish my Epic Saturday afternoon! Getting
the
> white scale last means you make three trade-ins in a row; pretty
> nervewracking if you ask me.
>
> I knew we had some red scales in our vault. My guild leader traded
a
> Velious haste cloak for the white scale. I have no idea where he
found
> one; I had assumed that every white scale on Innoruuk had been
sucked up
> already. He wasn't on to say. I doubt it was from Gorenaire,
since the
> only guilds capable of killing Gorenaire have Bards who still need
them,
> and I've heard nothing about the Scalegiver dropping whites. Maybe
a
> pickup Vox raid.
>
> Anyway, it's very cool. As a mostly melee Bard (blasphemy to some
of
> you, I know), this is a big improvement right across the board.
And I
> actually managed to raise Brass Instruments twice today singing a
Brass
> song in combat!
>
> 3.5 blue bubbles in 5 hours in Sebilis. We rocked.
>
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado <Silent Justice>, 57 songs, Innoruuk
